page.title: 20Peoples feelings on Uxbridge
page.content: Children and parents discussed their feelings about living in this area.Generally people were happy living here,but there were a few moans.They felt there should be more places for children and sport centres for all ages.In Uxbridge,there should be an indoor-swimming pool.Unused areas should be made into parks.The council take away old swings and slides but do not replace them,so the parks are becoming boring for children.More activities for children could be available during the holidays.There is not a cinema in this area also.Too many office blocks are being built. Supermarkets could have wider entrances for people in wheel chairs and also the 10 pence deposit on trollies was unpopular.
